display_name: Filtered: Overall RDI at 2% desat or arousal
description: RDI with Arousals at 2% desat  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas with arousal associated with >= 2% desat) / (hours of sleep)]
calculations: 60*(hremba2 +hroa2 + hnrba2 + hnroa2 +carba2+ caroa2 + canba2 + canoa2 + oarba2 + oaroa2 + oanba2 + oanoa2 + marbpa2 + maropa2 + manrbpa2 + manropa2) / slpprdp
